verses.text: How \w amiable|strong="H3039"\w* \add are\add* thy \w tabernacles|strong="H4908"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*!\f + \fr 84.1 \ft for the sons: or, of the sons\f*

My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w longeth|strong="H3700"\w*, yea, even \w fainteth|strong="H3615"\w* for the \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* and my \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* crieth \w out|strong="H7442"\w* for the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

Yea, the \w sparrow|strong="H6833"\w* hath \w found|strong="H4672"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w swallow|strong="H1866"\w* a \w nest|strong="H7064"\w* for herself, where she may \w lay|strong="H7896"\w* her \w young|strong="H0667"\w*, \add even\add* thine \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, my \w King|strong="H4428"\w*, and my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add are\add* they that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: they will be still \w praising|strong="H1984"\w* thee. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H0120"\w* whose \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \add is\add* in thee; in whose \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \add are\add* the \w ways|strong="H4546"\w* \add of them\add*.

\add Who\add* \w passing|strong="H5674"\w* through the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Baca|strong="H1056"\w* \w make|strong="H7896"\w* it a \w well|strong="H4599"\w*; the \w rain|strong="H4175"\w* also \w filleth|strong="H5844"\w* the \w pools|strong="H1293"\w*.\f + \fr 84.6 \ft Baca…: or, mulberry trees make him a well, etc\f*\f + \fr 84.6 \ft filleth: Heb. covereth\f*

They \w go|strong="H3212"\w* from \w strength|strong="H2428"\w* to \w strength|strong="H2428"\w*, \add every one of them\add* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w appeareth|strong="H7200"\w* before \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 84.7 \ft strength to…: or, company to company\f*

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*: give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
\w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* our \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*, and \w look|strong="H5027"\w* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of thine \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.

For a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in thy \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*. I had \w rather|strong="H0977"\w* be a \w doorkeeper|strong="H5605"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, than to \w dwell|strong="H1752"\w* in the \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*.\f + \fr 84.10 \ft I had…: Heb. I would choose rather to sit at the threshold\f*

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* a \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* and \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* and \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: no \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add thing\add* will he \w withhold|strong="H4513"\w* from them that \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H8549"\w*.
O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H0120"\w* that \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in thee.
